ifort -Xlinker --enable-new-dtags -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /opt/intel/oneapi/mpi/2021.10.0/lib/release -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /opt/intel/oneapi/mpi/2021.10.0/lib CMakeFiles/test.dir/example_out.f90.o -o test  /opt/intel/oneapi/mpi/2021.10.0/lib/libmpifort.so /opt/intel/oneapi/mpi/2021.10.0/lib/release/libmpi.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.a
